verses.name: Luke 19:17
verses.text: And he said unto him, Well, thou good servant: because thou hast been faithful in a very little, have thou authority over ten cities.

verses.name: Luke 19:18
verses.text: And the second came, saying, Lord, thy pound hath gained five pounds.

verses.name: Luke 19:19
verses.text: And he said likewise to him, Be thou also over five cities.

verses.name: Luke 19:20
verses.text: And another came, saying, Lord, behold, here is thy pound, which I have kept laid up in a napkin:

verses.name: Luke 19:21
verses.text: For I feared thee, because thou art an austere man: thou takest up that thou layedst not down, and reapest that thou didst not sow.
